text: Angus Gordon Davidson (born 2 October 1948) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Forfar Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Winterton Rangers F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Angus
title: Angus Davidson
